about_the_game:
"Top-Down Cyberpunk Action-Adventure"


A High-Octane Fusion of Boomer Shooter and Top-Down Combat Action!

Get ready for adrenaline-pumping action inspired by classic 80's and 90's games and action films.
Lead a Military Special Missions Unit in a battle against deadly lifeforms.

"A Forbidden World, Where Man Does Not Belong!"


Immerse yourself in a gripping top-down shooter that combines thrilling sci-fi firefights in bug infested hellscapes all the way to intense raw, jungle warfare.

The powerful mega-corporation operating on the giant space station Erena has resurrected life on the distant planet Zitatron-3. Erena is home to two distinct classes of humans: the privileged Citizens, who enjoy their lives in luxury, and the Workers, who live in grueling, prison-like conditions. These Workers dream of earning enough credits to elevate their families to citizenship and a better life.

Key Features:


• Intense Combat: Engage in heart-pounding, fast-paced battles against swarms of alien creatures and hostile forces. Utilize a wide array of weapons and tactics to survive and dominate.

• Rich Narrative: Unravel the story of a divided society on the brink of upheaval. Explore the harsh realities of life as a Worker and the opulence of Citizen life, and discover the dark secrets behind the corporation's resurrection of Zitatron-3.

• Special game modes: Explore procedurally generated levels with your crew, or see how long you can survive the endless onslaught of alien insect hordes.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. General Mature Content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 750 Ti or equivalent with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or equivalent with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
